page.title: 13Spare time
page.content: Most of the boys in our school play football in their spare time.There is small football pitch at school and in the village there is a playing field with a big football pitch there.The second favourite things were riding your bike and playing with your friends and they're not even half as popular as football was.When I say playing with my friends I mean just going over to their house and making games up to play or just sitting about talking.Riding your bike is both going on scramble tracks with your BMX (sports bike with toughened wheels etc) or just normaly riding about.Nearly as many people like watching television in their spare time as riding your bike and playing with your friends.I would have thought that television would be the most popular.
